plugin.name: cidmodem
plugin.description: Set caller id with a modem

key.name: startup-plugin
key.description: Automatically start plugin at Domogik startup

key.name: device
key.description: Modem device (ex: /dev/ttyUSB0 for an usb modem)

key.name: cid-command
key.description: AT CID command to be used by plugin to activate Caller Id mode on modem.
